channel.title: Operating System on Philomath's Lair!
channel.description: Recent content in Operating System on Philomath's Lair!

item.title: All about the process!
item.description: In this blog post, we will learn about what a process is, in computing context and how operating system is responsible for managing the multiple processes running in the system to use the computer hardware (processor and peripherals) optimally. Operating system is a very sophisticated and critical software that enables the user to use their computer most efficiently. Users run their program / tools on the computers by executing a set of instructions to achieve an output.
